DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy certolizumab pegol administer without coadministration methotrexate long term Japanese RA patient transfer Study 275-08-003 ( NCT00791921 ) , evaluate effect different dose regimen safety efficacy certolizumab pegol American College Rheumatology 20 % ( ACR20 ) responder complete Study 275-08-003 .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Treatment Study Certolizumab Pegol Without Coadministration Methotrexate Japanese Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study initiate Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co. , Ltd transfer Astellas 12/04/2012 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects participate Study 27508003 meet criterion describe . Patients reach ACR20 , prematurely discontinue Study 27508003 Week 16 complete Study 27508003 Week 24 . Patients experience important protocol deviation mention Study 27508003 . Patients receive live attenuate vaccine Study 27508003 ( Except influenza pneumococcal vaccine ) . Patients find tuberculosis chest Xray Study 27508003 . Patients required treatment infection two different time Study 27508003 Women pregnant , lactating , childbearing potential wish conceive study poststudy 3 month . Patients investigator decide inappropriate participation study
